transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Main bol raha hu ki mere ko bylead nahi milta hai.

Customer: Ek minute sir aapko batao aapko ye statue ka chahiye na marble ye sab mein?

Customer: Nahi nahi mere ko jo black stone aur sand stone mein hi chahiye aur marble mein bhi bylead chahiye lekin wo abhi mere ko bylead nahi nahi aata hai.

Customer: Kya problem hai thoda dekhenge to account mein catalog mein thoda problem hai kya?

Executive: Ek minute sir main check karungi.

Executive: Aap matlab aapko jo bylead chahiye sand stone ya phir aap marble mein chahiye na aur black stone mein?

Customer: Ji ji.

Customer: Lekin abhi to mere ko kuch nahi milta dekhiye mere catalog check kijiye recent mein aur mere payment mein aur category mein kuch nahi hai.

Executive: Yes sir.

Customer: Kya problem hai thoda dekhiye.

Executive: Sir dekhiye actually bylead aayi hai thik hai lekin shayad wo aap consume nahi kar paaye sir. Kyunki ye kal aaya tha stone statue ka Hyderabad Telangana se kal hi ke date mein sir matlab aapne past bylead mein dekho jaise kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai na jo high sold item hote hai na like jo aisa product hai jo jisme competition bahut jyada hai hai na to wo bahut jaldi sold out ho jata hai. Sir to bas ye wali dikkat aa rahi hogi sir aapke paas ki aapke paas shayad notification bhi aa raha hoga na lekin aap jab click karne ja rahe honge to wo sold out ho ja raha hoga aisa bhi dikkat aapko paas aa rahi hogi sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To aise nahi hai ki bylead bylead nahi hai abhi abhi koi posted bylead nahi hai lekin previous time mein teen din pehle char din pehle bahut sari black stone statue ki bhi bylead aayi hui hai sir Tamil Nadu se stone sculpture ki bhi aayi hui hai sir Chennai Tamil Nadu se bylead thi lekin hum usko connect nahi kar paaye isliye jaise abhi aap bylead pe itna active hote hai to hum kya pata hai kya kar sakte hai yaha pe aap waise aap generally system se dekhte ho ya phir mobile se dekhte ho sir aap?

Customer: Mobile mobile se.

Executive: Mobile se dekhte ho thik hai.

(silence)

Executive: Sir waha pe aap ek kaam kijiye aap aap bylead pe jaaiye.

Customer: Hmm ji.

Executive: Bylead ha waha pe bylead khuli hai ha waha pe upar mein three dots bane hue honge right side mein.

Customer: Ha past lead.

Executive: Ha past lead mein na aapko sare byleads dikhenge jo post hua tha jo hum consume nahi kar paaye sir.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Dikha aapko waha pe jab open karoge na to waha pe ek option rahega I am interested ka.

Customer: Ha ji ji.

Executive: Hai na to jis bhi product mein aap deal karte ho aur agar aap chahte ho ki is wali product se mujhe call inquiry aaye jaise dekhiye bylead jo aa raha hai sir wo humse pehle char panch log consume kar rahe hai to wo sold out ho ja raha hai hum usse connect nahi kar pa rahe to hame hamare paas hum ye koshish kar sakte hai sir ki hamare paas usse bylead nahi consume kar pa rahe to kam se kam hamare paas call aur inquiry aa jaye hai na jo direct message aata hai aur jo direct call aata hai to uske liye na hum ye I am interested dalenge na to ye wali jo keywords hai hamara jo search engine hai wo wo ye dekhega ki achha is wale product mein is keyword mein aap interested ho to waha se aapko calls inquiries aayegi thik hai.

Customer: Ji.

Customer: Ye jo jo I am interested jo isme hamara bylead katega kya?

Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul nahi sir kuch nahi katega aapka bylead bas wo hai ki aap is wale product mein kyuki dekhiye matlab aap just an example sir hamare paas bylead post ho rahi hai 10 thik hai matlab ek din mein 10 bylead post ho rahi hai aur hamare paas jo client hai jo bylead consume karne wale wo 25 matlab 100 hai to ek bylead ko panch logo ki wajah se aur ye itna kam first come first serve wala cheez hai sir matlab jaise hi jo sabse pehle aayega na.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: To sabse pehle aayega uspe click kar dega wo wo bylead usse consume ho jayega aur panch logo ke baad phir wo bylead koi aur consume nahi kar sakta lekin matlab aisa na ho ki aapko aisa lage ki IndiaMART pe bylead post nahi ho rahi bylead post hui hai lekin due to high competition hai sir yaha pe aap nahi consume kar pa rahe to uske liye hum kya kar sakte hai na ki hum calls aur inquiries pe jyada depend hai to calls aur inquiries badhane ka yahi hamare paas tarika hai sir ki hum na wo jo waha pe I am interested ka humne option isliye diya taki aap waha pe wo dalo taki next time jab bhi aap bylead aaye na taki aapke paas notification hai aur koshish kijiyega sir thoda aap thoda active rahiyega notification aate hi consume kijiye aur aisa nahi ki notification ka wait karna hai hame aaye matlab hum kuch time time pe aap ek baar open karke dekhiyega aur koshish kijiyega sir ki hum humne dekha hai ki jo bylead post hoti hai na generally wo na 6 baje ke baad jyadatar hoti hai thik hai kyuki sab free rehte hai to us time jyada subah subah 6 baje ke baad.

Executive: Nahi nahi sham mein kyuki sab free ho jate hai na to us time matlab aisa hai ki dekhiye bylead hamesha post hota hai lekin jyada evening mein 6 baje ke baad jyada post hota hai sir to us time thoda koshish kijiyega jyada active rehne ka aur subah mein thik hai kyuki subah mein aap jitna jaldi open karke ab just an example kisi ne raat mein 9 baje bylead post kiya to bahut log to nahi dekhenge na to wo lead rahegi to aap koshish kijiyega subah jaldi aa uthke ek baar aap check kar lo thik hai to waha se aapko lead mil jarur milegi aisa nahi hai sir ki lead post nahi ho raha lead post ho raha but hum usko connect nahi kar pa rahe aur jaha tak main calls aur inquiries ki baat kar rahi hu sir to aapko november mein

Executive: Aur inquiries ki agar main baat karu sir to abhi aapko do inquiry aayi hui thi IndiaMART se to aapki baat hui hai unse matlab kya requirement kisne ki thi aapke product ki thi sir ya phir kisi aur ki thi?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Main wahi bol rahi hu sir jo aapko inquiry aayi thi wo aapke product se related thi jo direct message aata hai sir.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Aapke unse tha to kis product se aaya hua tha sir?

Customer: Direct message mere ko aaya tha.

Executive: Ha jo direct message aata hai na lead manager se to wo aapke matlab aapke requirement ke regarding hi thi ya phir aap aap jisme deal karte hai uski aayi hui thi sir?

Customer: Nahi nahi mera mera hi thi.

Executive: Meri hi aayi hui thi na to jaise aap dekhiye aap jo inquiry aaya tha sir aapko do thik hai to usse aap call kar sakte hai sir wo sab data aapke paas hamesha rahega kyuki samne wala customer aapke interested tha aapke catalog dekh kar aapko message kiya tha ya phir jo call karte hai thik hai to hum koshish karenge na jaise aapko ye jo do inquiry aayi hai na sir koshish kijiyega unko teen reply karne ka thik hai jaise aapne unko message kar dena thank you for inquiry catalog link bhej dena thik hai product is available aise waha pe drop box mein na messages hote hai wo message unko reply karne ka koshish karna thik hai aapko teen reply karoge na sir to us us keyword se us product se aapko jyada se jyada calls aur inquiries aayegi thik hai ab ye teen cheez karna jo bhi calls aayega unko teen message karna thik hai jo bhi inquiries aayega aur jo bhi past lead hai na usme I am interested dalna agar us wale product mein aap deal karte honge thik hai ye aap kijiyega thik hai aur baki sir jaise ki aapka main ek baar keyword discuss kar leti hu ki kaun kaun se hai pehla aapka hai

Executive: Ek minute.

Executive: Ha pehla aapka hai stone statue thik hai sir?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Uske baad hai black stone sculpture.

Executive: Thik hai phir aapka god stone statue aur hai phir aapka marble god statue matlab generally aap achha ye bataiye stone stone garden statue hai to ab ye bataiye stone ke bench bhi matlab usme bhi deal karte hai kya aap ya phir aap matlab generally aap statues mein deal karte hai hai na?

Customer: Ji ji statue mein deal karte hai.

Executive: Okay.

Executive: Thik hai kuch aur jankari chahiye sir aapko ab na ek kaam kijiye aap ye do cheez jarur kijiyega thik hai aur next time agar aapko main wo koshish karke dekhta hu dekhta hu mere ko milega to phir kya hai nahi milega to phir main phone karunga aapko phir.

Executive: Ha main aapko na ha aur ek kaam ab na abhi jaise main ye na aapka ye concern abhi close kar du sir.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Ab close sir dekhiye sir aapke paas ek notification aayega mail pe thik hai aap satisfy not satisfy jaise dunga please usme mention kar dijiyega thik hai main aapka ye concern close kar rahi hu ye close karne ke baad main aapko na apne personal number se call karti hu sir thik hai us wale number ko aap save kar lijiyega in future agar aapko kabhi bhi dikkat hoga na sir to aap us number pe direct call kijiyega to aapko na immediate basis pe main aapko resolution de paungi thik hai sir.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Thik hai sir thank you okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants buyleads for black stone and sandstone.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about sold out buyleads.

- Advised to check past buyleads.

- Suggested using the 'I am interested' option.

- Explained how the search engine uses keywords.

- Clarified that using 'I am interested' won't deduct buyleads.

- Suggested checking for buyleads after 6 PM.

- Advised to reply to inquiries promptly.

- Discussed the customer's keywords for statues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested steps.

- Executive will call from personal number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, statues, i am interested, keywords
